name: Note Mark AIO
description: Note Mark Aio is a self-hosted note taking app that allows you to create, organize, and share notes. It's a fork of the popular note-mark app with a focus on simplicity and ease of use.
longDescription: Note Mark Aio is a self-hosted note taking app that allows you to create, organize, and share notes. It's a fork of the popular note-mark app with a focus on simplicity and ease of use.
